about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a world of revenge to assume your role as the true king in an adventure full of dark creatures into the heart of hell.

In this epic journey of light against darkness you live in the shoes of the warrior Vergil who seeks revenge against the last skull king.

Be strong and courageous during your journey facing Zombies, wizards, ghosts and many other creatures with your powerful sword!

Avoid traps, destroy enemies with your powerful sword, quickly jump over platforms avoiding falling over the cliff like in classic action and adventure games from the 90s. Experience that nostalgia with Exodos!

Features:
  • 33 levels divided into 7 acts.
  • Exciting action gameplay - use physical combos
  • Different obstacles and enemies.
  • Free imprisoned souls to paradise.
  • Beautiful animated graphics
  • 2D action platformer
